summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction and acquisition of a power tunnel from the Diablo Dam on the Skagit River to the site of a proposed power plant, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to and extensions of the municipal light and power plant and system contemplated by, Ordinance No. 54006, authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
